name: Jun Ren
tagline: 1230 1/2 W 27th street, Los Angeles, CA, 90007 213-509-1196 • brettren07@gmail.com
body:
## Education
University of Southern California                                            01/2013 - 12/2014  
Master of Science in Electrical Engineering   GPA: 3.38/4.0

South China University of Technology                                         09/2008 - 06/2012  
Bachelor of Engineering in Electronics Science and Technology 
## Knowledge and Skills
Language and IDE: Java, C/C++, Eclipse  
Web development: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, AJAX, JSON, PHP, DOM  
Database: MySQL

## Experience
Game (Network) Design and AI implementation                                08/2014 – 09/2014  
Keywords: Java, Eclipse, OOP, Recursion, Game Tree Search, Alpha-beta Pruning
•	Implemented a program that played the game Network automatically against an opponent.
•	The game was played on an 8-by-8 board. Each player tried to complete a network connecting its two opposite goal areas. The program could identify the game rule, finding the best move that was likely to win the game.
•	Applied Alpha-beta pruning technique to search game tree.

Database Implementation                                                  10/2014 – 11/2014  
Keywords: MySQL, Java, JDBC
•	Realized a practical database implementation based on a given relational schema within the MySQL DBMS. 
•	The application was for an online video sharing website, keeping track of information about registered users and the videos that they upload, view, and rate, the categories, prices and clicks of each advertisement.
•	Created the database, wrote a Java program to populate it from provided raw data using JDBC.
•	Wrote SQL queries according to given requirement to be executed from the MySQL command line tool. The queries are targeted to find the lowest average rating videos, most profitable advertisements, etc.
•	Wrote a Java program to query and manipulate the database programmatically using JDBC.

Server - side Scripting for Movie Search                                               07/2014  
Keywords: PHP, CGI, HTML
•	Created a HTML webpage to search movies from IMDb. Viewer can enter movie title in box, select media type, and submit the form.
•	PHP script grabbed the data from the HTML page and sent the constructed URL to the IMDb website.
•	Script parsed and extracted the information from resulting web page by regular expressions, displaying result in a table, which listed the image, title, rating, link of each movie.

Parse XML document to HTML page                                                 06/2014  
Keywords: HTML, XML, DOM, JavaScript, AJAX
•	Wrote a HTML/JavaScript program, which took the URL of an XML document containing Customer and Order information, retrieved the XML file by AJAX, parsed the file into a DOM tree, and extracted the list of Customers, displaying them in a table without reloading the whole page.
•	Viewer could select any one of the Customers and the orders corresponding to the selected Customer would be extracted and displayed in another table.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
